Title: Relates to requiring delinquent licensees to make future alcoholic beverage purchases to manufacturers and wholesalers in cash
Summary: Requires delinquent licensees to make future alcoholic beverage purchases to the manufacturer or wholesaler from which they are delinquent in cash; requires a licensee who has become delinquent on a second account within thirty days to make future alcoholic beverage purchases to any manufacturer or wholesaler in cash.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to requiring delinquent licensees to make future alcoholic beverage purchases to manufacturers and wholesalers in cash
